snippet.title: Undertale Red & Yellow Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the mod!
https://gamebanana.com/mods/496958
(Or if you prefer Gamejolt):
https://gamejolt.com/games/undertale-red-yellow/877387

Have you played Undertale Yellow?
After completing it, did you think: "Man, I really wanna replay Undertale now, but I've already played it so many times..."
No?
WELL TOO BAD!
Introducing: Undertale Red & Yellow!
An Undertale mod designed to scratch that Undertale Yellow itch!
Features:
- Two headghosts watching your every move!
- An improved Defense system to match UTY's!
- Checking enemies now provides their real stats!
- Additional settings!
- An Easy, Hard, and No-hit mode!
- Fixing all of Toby's mistakes! (And making 20 new ones.)
- Area specific battle backgrounds!
- A run button! (finally)
- The Mad Mew Mew fight!
- ???

Thank you KALeido for making this trailer! Check them out here: https://twitter.com/KALeidotoast
Also thanks to Viviiyon for making the thumbnail art!
https://twitter.com/viviiyon
And of course, check out Undertale Yellow if you haven't already!
https://gamejolt.com/games/UndertaleYellow/136925


(Chara sprite taken from https://www.spriters-resource.com/custom_edited/undertalecustoms/sheet/80981/ )
